name: Black Polkadot Tulle Prom Dress - Gloria
description:
Black tulle cocktail dress embellished with hand stitched glistening dot sequins. 
A real head turner in bold monochrome with 1950s inspired prom dress styling. 
A boned bodice gives a gorgeous silhouette with delicate ruffles around the sweetheart bodice.

A tulle wrap is included which we love to tie as a halter strap and large bow at the back. Being such a show stopper, simply team with black heels and clean black fifties flicks for make up. 

Fastening: concealed zip to the centre back

Fit: tightly fitted strapless bodice to the true waist and full skirt

Fabrics: soft nylon tulle, acetate lining

This dress can be made to our standard sizing or made to measure. Please allow up to two weeks for us to hand make your dress for you at our studio. Made in England.

All dresses are shipped worldwide with tracked delivery.

name: Glitter Silk Bow Tie
description:
Luxurious black glitter and silk double bow tie. Add a subtle spark to a tuxedo with this coarse ground glitter tie backed with a handwoven pure silk. 

Pre-tied on an adjustable silk band with clip fastening. 

Designed and hand crafted in the UK. 

Materials - 100% silk and Glitter cotton. 

Size: width: 8cms

As featured in the New York Times, Lens blog.

name: Black Tulle Prom Dress - Raven
description:
Our classic deb dress has grown some sultry sophistication evolving into the perfect little black dress. 
Many layers of soft tulle are pleated, gathered and draped with it's full ballerina skirt giving the most feminine 50's style. 

Team with one of our skinny glitter belts and grab a matching sparkly bow clutch to finish. Shoes with a good arched heel or pointed ballet flats work best, avoid clumpy wedges. 

Fully lined in taffeta with a boned bodice for support. Optional fine ribbon straps can be sewn in. 

Fastening: zip to centre back

Fit: tightly fitted strapless bodice to the true waist, full skirt.

Fabrics: soft nylon tulle and acetate taffeta lining

Glitter Belt Not Included

This dress can be made to our standard sizing or made to measure. Please allow up to two weeks for us to hand make your dress for you at our studio. Made in England.

All dresses are shipped worldwide with tracked delivery.

name: Red Lace Cocktail Dress
description:
Captivating red lace cocktail dress, a showstopper at any event.

Style with nude, red or introduce a third colour of accessories, classic 50's flicks and nude glossy lips. 

Details: sweeping boat neckline with long fitted sleeves and a tightly fitted bodice. Supported with a nude sweetheart boned bodice and features a full pleated skirt and long tie belt.

Colour: scarlet red and nude

Fabric: 100% cotton and nylon lace

Fit: Fitted bodice, full skirt. Skirt length 22"

Fastening: concealed zipper to the centre back

Care: hand wash.

Lead time: ready to wear.

Hand made in the UK.

name: Red Silk Party Dress MADE TO ORDER
description:
Deep shimmering ruby red silk taffeta party dress with a sweeping neckline and low scoop back. 
Fitted though the bodice and with a swishing knee length full skirt this dress will be a party staple for seasons to come. 

Prep up with fitted shirts underneath or simply with a killer pair of heels and full underskirts for a night out dancing. 

Details: lined in blue satin with boned support and separate net underskirts to plump the skirt. Pockets hidden in the skirt.

Colour: deep ruby red

Fabric: 100% silk handwoven dupion. 

Fit: tightly fitted bodice. Knee length skirt.

Fastening: concealed zipper to the centre back

Care: dry clean

Lead time: 2 weeks

Hand made in the UK.

name: Red Silk Tartan Dress MADE TO ORDER
description:
The fabulous red silk tartan cocktail dress, designed for a festive Royal cocktail party. Inspired by Princess Alexandra's Victorian party dresses worn in the Scotland. The folded bodice gives added texture with a décolletage framing halter sweetheart neckline. 

sweetheart boned bodice
folded halter strap
draped and folded bodice detail
two tiered full skirt
black velvet sash belt
soft net underskirts included
satin trim

Fastening: concealed zipper to the centre back

Fabrics: pure silk taffeta tartan (other tartans are available, please contact us to order)

Rich yellow lace and silk chiffon cocktail dress - The Dianna

Tightly fitted with a stretch lace scallop edge bodice and long slender sleeves. Underneath a silk covered bodice adds structure and support with boning, giving the lace a sheer illusion. 
The waistline is scalloped and gently sits above the fine gathered skirt. 
Fully lined in silk with a detachable net underskirt to give volume to the skirt. 

Fastening: concealed zipper to the centre back.

Fabric: 100% silk

name: Debby Tulle Prom Dress MADE TO ORDER
description:
One of my favourite vintage pieces and one of my first finds was a classic 50's tulle prom dress.

They are an iconic 50's garment and a real must have, it was time I did my own take on the vintage classic. Works perfectly as a wedding dress too!

This strapless version is hand built onto a boned bodice with a gathered, ruffle bust and fine pleated long line bodice. 
The skirt is layered (no need for nets) with stitched down pleats over the hips and is cut to the knee. The skirt is lined and the dress comes with two ribbon belts for the waist in different complementary colours.

Fabric: Nylon tulle, Silk Lining

Fastening: hook fastening at the back

Colour: Peach, Black or Ivory - please contact us if you would like this dress in a different colour

Washing: dry clean only

PLEASE ALLOW TWO WEEKS FOR YOUR DRESS TO BE MADE FOR YOU.

*Each dress is made to order, please email us with your measurements if you would like it made to measure.

name: All About Eve - 50s style tulle cocktail dress
description:
Made to Order

A classic black (or any colour of your choice) tulle cocktail dress with a glam fifties silhouette.

We wanted to create something that screamed of a 50's film noir, cocktail hour with sheer detailing over a strong sweetheart silhouette. Here's the result....

The dress has a sweetheart bodice in silk, edged in black satin with a dramatic draped tulle neckline. The waist is cinched with our wide waistband and the skirt is full circle cut with a matching tulle top layer.

Perfect with a pair of vintage heels, a splash of red lipstick and killer good looks!

Fabrics: nylon tulle, silk taffeta

Colour: available to be made in Black, Ivory, Red and Navy

Washing: dry clean only

Order Time: approx 2 weeks

description:

The figure hugging bodice has hidden corseting to cinch the waist and contrast against the finely pleated full bell skirt.

name: Navy Lace Wrap Top LIMITED EDITION
description:
Cut with a fifties elegance our sheer, subtly sexy wrap bodice in navy lace is an easy to wear choice for evenings and events. 

Style with high waisted skirts revealing slight peeks of the stomach or with dresses. Play around with nude, sans or bright contrasting bras depending on the outfit. 

Details: boat neckline trimmed in navy blue satin with french seam detail inside. Sheer with long wrap around ties to fasten and low cut back.

Colour: navy blue with gold flecks

Fabric: Nylon, vintage dead stock lace

Fit: tightly fitted

Care: hand wash.

Lead time: 1 week

Hand made in the UK. Limited Edition of 5 made

name: Pale blue silk bodice
description:
Smokey pale blue silk bodice with a dramatic self tie bow on the hip and pretty covered buttons running down the back. Designed for Marie Antoinette romance.

Style with our soft tulle ballerina skirt or with a printed pencil skirt in complimenting colours.

Details: boned strapless bodice, lined in silk with matching trims

Colour: pale smokey blue 

Fabric: 100% silk

Fit: tightly fitted bodice cut to the true waist.

Fastening: open ended zip fastening

Care: dry clean

Lead time: ready to wear, one of a kind.

Hand made in the UK.

name: Silver Glitter Bodice Top - MADE TO ORDER
description:
Glitter encrusted bodice shaped into a sweetheart for a show stopping sparkle. 
The bodice with it's sculpted accent over the sweetheart is gorgeous styled to full opulence with our Titania skirt. Alternatively work a rockabilly look with high waisted super skinny jeans. We love mixing up the textures and styling with tweeds and denims too. 

Fully lined in silky satin with a matte cotton trim and zip fastening at the back. Boned for support. 

Fabrics: 
glitter coated cotton twill
satin lining

This bodice can be made to our standard sizing or made to measure. Please allow up to two weeks for us to hand make your bodice for you at our studio. Hand Made in England.

All items are shipped worldwide with tracked delivery.

name: Black Lace Capelet - Lilia
description:
The perfect cover up for cocktail dresses in fine pleated lace with a chartreuse green velvet tie. 
The tulle collar is embroidered with fine scallops and the capelet is beautifully full draping over the shoulders. 

Wear with little black dresses or as a pretty contrast to a fitted vest and jeans. 

Fit and fastening: one size, tie at collar

Fabrics: vintage black lace tulle , velvet ribbon, nylon tulle

This capelet can be made to our standard sizing or made to measure. Please allow up to two weeks for us to hand make your capelet for you at our studio. Made in England.

All items are shipped worldwide with tracked delivery.

name: Silk Full Skirt - MADE TO ORDER
description:
Ruby red silk taffeta full bell skirt with fitted waistband and soft tulle underskirts to maintain the beautiful rustling fullness. 

Team up with casual t-shirts for a day event and with strapless bodices or lace shirts for more formal evening dress. 

Colour: deep ruby red

Fabric: 100% silk handwoven dupion. Lined with tulle nets

Fit: tightly fitted high waistband cut to the knee. Hidden pockets in the seam.

Fastening: concealed zipper to the centre back

Care: dry clean 

Lead time: 1 week

Hand made in the UK.

name: Blue Tulle Ballerina Skirt MADE TO ORDER
description:
Soft baby blue tulle ballerina skirt, gorgeously full and a dream to dress up in.

Style with a fitted bodice for formal or with a fitted vest or fine knit sweater for a chic evening look.

Details: fitted silk waistband, full layers of tulle and lined in satin.

Colour: pale baby blue (also available in ivory and white please request)

Fabric: nylon tulle and silk

Fit: fitted to the true waist. Length 22"

Fastening: concealed zipper to the centre back

Care: hand wash cool

Lead time: 2 weeks

Hand made in the UK.

name: Tulle Ballerina Skirt MADE TO ORDER
description:
Soft ivory tulle ballerina skirt with Liberty print waistband to match our Capel print bodice. 

Style with our matching capel bodice or a simple jersey vest.

Details: Fitted cotton waistband with full layers of tulle and lined in satin

Colour: ivory with pink printed waistband

Fabric: soft nylon veiling tulle and acetate satin lining.

Fit: fitted to the true waist, very full

Fastening: concealed zipper to the centre back

Care: hand wash

Lead time: 2 weeks

Hand made in the UK.

name: Gold 'Tied in a Bow' Purse
description:
Sparkling pale gold present design evening purse. Trimmed with a darkest chocolate velvet ribbon appliqued design finished with a bow. 

Hand-crafted at our Somerset studio with a pure silk lining and metal zip fastening. Slip on your wrist with the long zip pull.

Small enough to fit in your pocket and large enough to fit everything you need for a night out.

Designed and made in the UK.

Made from: 
Glitter coated fabric lined in silk . Wipe clean with a damp cloth.

Dimensions: 
17cms x 13cms

name: Emerald Deco Glitter Purse
description:
Beautifully elegant Art Deco inspired silver and emerald green diamond design cocktail purse with green silk lining. Swing from your wrist 1920s style.

This little purse makes a gorgeous party accessory luxuriously lined in silk and fastening with a metal zipper. 

Large enough for your phone, money, keys and lipstick etc. 
Measures 13cms x 17cms 

Made from a professionally coated, high quality glitter fabric made in the UK and doesn't loose it's sparkle.

name: Blue Deco Star Purse
description:
Bright cobalt blue glittering evening purse with gold deco star applique design. 

Hand-crafted at our Somerset studio with a pure silk lining and metal zip fastening. Slip on your wrist with the long zip pull. 

Small enough to fit in your pocket and large enough to fit everything you need for a night out. 

Designed and made in the UK.

Made from: 
Glitter coated fabric lined in silk . Wipe clean with a damp cloth.

Dimensions: 
17cms x 13cms

name: Silver 'Tied in A Bow' Purse
description:
Glittering silver and candy pink present purse. Trimmed with a grosgrain ribbon design and finished with a bow. 

Hand-crafted at our Somerset studio with a pure silk lining and metal zip fastening. Slip on your wrist with the long zip pull.

Small enough to fit in your pocket and large enough to fit everything you need for a night out.

Designed and made in the UK.

Made from: 
Glitter coated fabric lined in silk . Wipe clean with a damp cloth.

17cms x 13cms

name: Red Polka dot glitter purse
description:
Red and white polka dot glittering evening purse. 

Made in a bright ruby slipper red glitter with hand appliqued dots and lined in a luxurious pure silk. The pouch purse fastens with a metal zipper and is small enough to fit in your pocket and large enough to fit everything you need.

Handcrafted at our Somerset studio this little rounded purse is a gorgeous gift for the festive season.

Designed and hand made in the UK.

Made from:
Glitter coated fabric lined in silk. Wipe clean with a damp cloth.

Dimensions:
17cms x 13cms

name: Black Cat Purse
description:
Our little black cat purse in shimmering black glitter. 

This luxury purse is made from a coarse glitter fabric and lined in silk with a metal zipper to fasten. This little cat is fat enough to hold your essentials, phone, keys ......

Just pull his bow trimmed tail to fasten. 

Fabrics: glitter coated cotton, silk

Size: 17cms x 12cms

Designed and hand made at our studio in the UK.

name: Humbug Stripe Bag
description:
Whimsical red and white candy stripe evening bag with threaded chain strap.

A sweet novelty for the holiday season in the form of our Humbug glittering evening bag.

The bag has a detachable silver metal strap threaded with matching red glitter and fastens with a strong metal zipper at the top. Luxuriously lined in silk this little bag is large enough to fit everything you need for a night out.

Our bag makes a wonderful sparkling gift and is delivered in a gift box, wrapped in tissue and tied with a ribbon.

Designed and hand made at our studio in the UK.

Made from:
Glitter coated fabric, lined in silk with a metal chain strap. Hand made in the UK. Wipe clean with a damp cloth.

Dimensions:
30cms x 20cms

name: Candy Stripe Purse
description:
Glittering candy stripe purse with red and white humbug stripes.

Handcrafted at our Somerset studio this little rounded purse is a gorgeous gift for the festive season.

Made in a durable white glitter fabric with applique red glitter stripes and lined in a luxurious pure silk. The pouch purse fastens with a metal zipper and is small enough to fit in your pocket and large enough to fit everything you need for a night out.

Designed and hand made in the UK.

Made from:
Glitter coated fabric lined in silk . Wipe clean with a damp cloth.

Dimensions:
17cms x 13cms

name: Red Glitter Evening Purse
description:
Our Glittering curved edge purse with secure metal zip fastening and silk lining. Complete with wristlet zip pull. Hand made in your choice of colour. 

Measures: 17cms x 14cms perfect to fit your phone, glasses and cards. 

Designed and hand made in England at our studio.

name: Glitter Bow Belt - Silver
description:
Glitter up any outfit with our sparkling belts. A wider belt for dresses with a gorgeous round bow in the centre.  

The belt measures 5cms wide and is perfect for adding that certain sparkle to a dress or outfit. Lined in a silk and fastening with a hook underneath the belt. 

Materials: glitter cotton, silk lined

Hand Made in England and shipped worldwide via tracked delivery.

name: Glitter Scallop Purse - Navy
description:
Glittering multi coloured scallop edge purse with zip fastening and silk lining. 

Non drop glitter outer
scallop edge
zip fastening
silk lining

Measures: 17cms x 14cms perfect to fit your phone, glasses and cards. 

Designed and hand made in England at our studio.

name: Glitter Bow Clutch Bag - Colour Options
description:
Sparkling Glitter evening bag, the perfect little party bag and our best selling glitter accessory. 

Our favorite glittering bag is large enough for all your essentials with a luxurious quilted silk or cotton lining and large detachable bow making this a coveted statement piece. 

Available in a spectrum of gorgeous colours, the classic ruby red, sophisticated black or pearly white for that all important occasion. 


Details: 

Large detachable bow
Fold over flap with silver metal fastening
Lined in a sweetheart quilted cotton or silk
Plenty of room for a phone, purse, makeup, everything you need. 

Measurements: 

23cms x 16cms x 5.5cms 

Designed and Made in England. 
Arrives with a tulle dust bag and packaged in a sturdy black box for storage.

name: Glitter Skinny Belt - Colour Options
description:
Our classic skinny glitter belt with metal slider buckle fastening. A gorgeous band of sparkles to dress up a simple outfit. 

The skinny glitter measures 2cms wide and fastens with a slider buckle so that you can wear your belt low with your jeans, to cinch a shirt dress on the waist or add extra detail over a wide waistband.

Materials: glitter cotton, satin

Length: 36" to adjust wear high on the waist or hips

Hand Made in the UK and shipped worldwide via tracked delivery.

name: Glitter Bow Clutch Bag - Pearly Queen
description:
Sugar coated shimmering pearl glitter encrusted clutch bag complimented by a tropical pink silk lining. 
Made in a matte glitter that screams of late fifties clean design with its sculptural candy tones straight from Sindy's wardrobe. 

Its a tone that works with a bridal wardrobe as much as a pink shift dress, French stripes or black lace. Classic and cool, better than pearls. 

Details: 

Large detachable bow, lined in silk with a clasp
Fold over flap with silver metal fastening
Lined in a pink quilted silk 
Plenty of room for a phone, purse, makeup, everything you need. 

Measurements: 

23cms x 16cms x 5.5cms 

Made in England.

name: Glitter Dress Bow - COLOUR OPTIONS
description:
Bows our our signature accessory and what better way to embellish your party dress, than with a glittering bow just like a present. 

Our glitter bows are ideal for that little black dress and for adding a new style to a wardrobe favourite. 
Wear on the back of a dress, on an asymmetric shoulder or even attached to an Alice band as a statement head piece. 

The bow is lined in silk and has a brooch back to fasten to clothing or a belt. 
Packaged with a satin Alice band or ribbon sash. 

Measures: 31cms long and 16cms wide

Hand Made in England and shipped worldwide via tracked delivery.

name: Black Velvet Hair Bow
description:
Our classic and utterly chic black velvet hair bow with barette clasp to wear however you like.

Measures 16cms across

Hand made in the UK at our studio and shipped worldwide

name: Green Velvet Bow Belt
description:
Gorgeously luxurious bottle green velvet bow belt. Add a little charm to your party dress or pretty up a simple shift. 

Width: 50mm 

Fastening: concealed zipper to the centre back

Fit: cut for the true high waist 

Fabrics: velvet

This belt can be made to our standard sizing or made to measure. Please allow up to 3 days for us to hand make your belt for you at our studio. Made in England.

All items are shipped worldwide with tracked delivery.

name: Astor - Hand woven silk and tulle asymmetric gown
description:
The exaggerated bow and and full ballerina skirt make this a beautifully feminine bridal gown. 

Off white hand woven silk is draped across the neckline and fixed with an original vintage brooch . 
The bodice is fitted with an intergrated corset and has hand draped pleats and folds over the hips finishing in the large bow. 
The ballerina skirt is made from many, many layers of soft tulle and is fully lined in silk satin. 
Our hand beaded belt is included to finish this dress. 

Details:
Fabric 1: handwoven silk dupion
Fabric 2: polyamide
Fabric 3: cotton muslin interlining

Fastening: concealed zipper and hooks

This dress is made to order and hand crafted at our studio in the UK. Lead time 4-8 weeks for your dress to be made.

Bust (fullest part)

Length: Waist to Hem

name: Christy – Silk duchess satin full skirt gown
description:
Finished with exquisite hand beading and a stunning full tea length skirt, this classic dress is charmingly elegant with it's vintage styling.
 
Made in a silk duchess satin and hand beaded at the neckline and cuffs. The skirt is a double full skirt making this wonderfully swish and lots of fun for the first dance. 
The bodice is fitted with a princess line cut and graduating skirt line to exaggerate the nipped in waist shaping. 
Fully lined with an integrated corset and net underskirts. 

Covered satin buttons trim the centre back fastening and our hand beaded belt is included to finish the waist. 

Details:
Fabric 1: silk duchess satin
Fabric 2: polymide
Fabric 3: cotton muslin interlining
Fabric 4: polyamide

Fastening: concealed zipper and hooks

Colour: Ivory (can be made in a colour of your choice)

name: Faye – Fine wool crepe bias gown
description:
Finest matt wool crepe with a glistening hand beaded, rhinestone bow and delicate gathers encapsulate the 1930s silver screen style that inspired this dress. 

The dress is softly cut with bias cut panels, long cross over straps at the low cut back and a small train to the full draped skirt. The dress slips on and is fully lined in a light silk satin. 

Details:

description:
This stunning princess coat is the perfect addition to wear with our 'Dew' dress and to complete the wedding ensemble.
Inspired by the 1950s and 60s chic weddings of the stars in particular Jackie Onassis. 

Beads and rhinestones trim this beautiful duchess satin coat along the scalloped cuffs and the waist line. The cut is fitted and softly tailored with opulent pleats at the back and gorgeous light-catching scallops at the centre front. Fully lined in silk satin with a muslin interlining and a tulle skirt lining.

Fabric 1: silk duchess satin

name: Swanson – Silk duchess satin hourglass gown
description:
Inspired by the old Hollywood red carpet gown, this dress is designed to be breathtakingly elegant. 

Fine hand sewn pleats top this fabulous silhouette and the corseted sweetheart bodice. 
The liquid bias cut skirt is is cinched at the waist and smoothes to a full hem and train finishing the perfect hourglass shaping. 

A large bow and detachable chapel length train adds further drama folding around the hips. 
Trimmed with satin covered buttons and a hand beaded belt to finish. 
The dress is fully lined in silk satin with an integrated corseted bodice and fastens with a concealed zipper to the centre back.

This dress is made to order and hand crafted at our studio in the UK. Lead time 4-8 weeks for your dress to be made.

description:
Effortlessly chic and elegant, this ivory satin dress is pure understated glamour. Perfect for an intimate wedding between eloped lovers. 
The dress is made in an ivory silk duchess satin with a dramatic pleated cocoon skirt and a fine princess line bodice. Fully lined in silk satin with a concealed zip fastening to the centre back and an internal boned bodice. 
The back of the dress is cut low in a V and comes with a hand beaded belt to finish the waist.

name: Joslin – Soft Tulle Asymmetric Gown
description:
Ethereal and delicate this long tulle gown is romantically designed with goddess appeal. 

The dress is made in two pieces with a silk satin hourglass under dress which is cut on the bias with a corseted sweetheart bodice. 

The top layer is a fine soft tulle asymmetrically draped with hand beading on the shoulder and a full tulle skirt which floats to the floor. The under dress fastens with a concealed zipper and the top layer fastens with hooks at the waist. 

A beautiful beaded rose belt adds detail to the waist and finishes this stunning bridal ensemble.

name: Claudia - Champagne tulle pleated wedding gown
description:
Champagne tulle pleated full length gown with muted 1920s bead and sequin trim. 

Halter neckline and sweetheart cut, the dress is hand draped onto a corsetted bodice with a feminine fitted long line. The dress sweeps to a graduated hem line and a dramatic full skirt. Fully lined.

Fastening: Concealed zip to the centre back
Fabrics: silk lining and soft tulle outer. Vintage beaded trim may vary 

This dress is hand made to order at our studio in the UK. 

Lead time: approx 12 weeks plus delivery times.

name: Judy - Hourglass Polkadot Illusion Tulle Short Wedding Dress
description:
Hourglass illusion dress in sheer soft polka dot tulle. 

The tulle is hand sewn over the corseted sweetheart bodice with an asymmetric neckline. 
The fitted pencil cut skirt under the full bell top layer gives a stunning hourglass illusion to the dress in different lights. 
Trimmed with a candy stripe bow to finish. 

Fastening: concealed zipper to the centre back
Fabrics: nylon tulle with a silk under dress. 

This dress is hand made to order at our studio in the UK. 

Lead Time: approx 6 weeks plus delivery time

name: Carla - Pale Blue Silk and Tulle Short Dress
description:
Pale blue silk taffeta fifties Vegas inspired short wedding dress with hand pleated sweetheart bodice and rockabilly framed halter neckline. 

The bodice is tightly fitted with internal corseting contrasting against the full twisted pleat skirt. 
A swarovski dotted white tulle petticoat is revealed through the draped skirt adding further texture to the design. 

Fully lined. 

Fastening: concealed zipper to the centre back
Fabrics: silk taffeta and tulle 

This dress is hand made to order at our studio in the UK. 

Lead time: approx 6 weeks plus delivery

name: Louisa - Beaded Ivory Tulle Tea Length Wedding Gown
description:
Soft ivory tulle ballerina bridal gown with tea length cut and hand pleated bodice. 

The dress has many sheer layers with a sweetheart corseted bodice underneath and striped hemmed underskirts that glimse through the gathered tulle. 
Tightly fitted with a v shaped neckline to the bodice, smooth stitched hips and flaring to the full 1950s ballerina skirt. 

Embellished with swarovski crystal rhinestones in the form of a dotted patern and trimmed at the waist with a ribbon sash. 

The sleeves are a main feature to the design, heavily beaded in ivory pearl seed beads to a tattoo inspired pattern. 

*This dress can be made with plain tulle or beaded sleeves. The sleeve beading pattern will be discussed and designed for you personally upon order. 

Fastening: concealed zipper to the centre back
Fabrics: silk lining with nylon tulle outer

This dress is hand made to order at our studio in the UK. 

Lead time: approx 12 weeks plus delivery

options.name: Made to measure - with beaded sleeves
made to measure - with plain sleeves

name: Penelope - Silk Crepe Ivory Hourglass Wedding Dress
description:
Our Marylin inspired tea length crepe wedding dress with plenty of wiggle. 

The dress features a sweetheart bodice with internal corseting and a high cut back trimmed with covered buttons. 

Elbow length fitted sleeves with a slight puff to the shoulder. The skirt is pencil cut to the lower calf and a long dove grey silk satin sash is tied at the waist to finish. 

Adorned all over with Swarovski rhinestones to form the polka dot pattern. 

Fastening: hooks and a concealed zipper to the centre back

Fabrics: heavy silk crepe with a silk satin sash and fully lined. 

This dress is made to order at our studio in the UK. 

Lead Time: approx 6 weeks plus delivery

name: Beaded Rose Belt
description:
Hand beaded organza rose belt made to order from our studio. 

This belt adds the finishing touch to the bridal trousseau with hand sculpter roses set to one side and silve glass beads triming the edges and forming stripes along the belt. 

Colour: White.  This belt is made to order and can be made in a colour of your choice, please contact us with your request.

Fastens at the side with hooks.

name: Silver Hand Beaded Belt
description:
Hand beaded at our studio in the UK with glass rhinestones and beads in an At Deco style pattern. 

This slim beaded belt is a beautiful finishing touch to your dress. 

Lined in silk and fastens with hooks at the side. 

Colour: silver, transparent glass 

PLEASE PROVIDE YOUR WAIST MEASUREMENT WHEN ORDERING.

LEAD TIME: 4 WEEKS PLUS SHIPPING TIMES

name: Betty's Black Dress - little black silk dress
description:
Our simple, elegant and devastatingly chic little black silk dress with a timeless 1950s style.

Round neckline
Cutaway shoulders
Fitted bodice with darted shaping
Fitted cinch waistband
Full gathered skirt
Lined with nets to support the skirt
Edged in cotton with a V shaped back
Pockets hidden in the skirt
Lined waistband and skirt


Fastens with a concealed zipper at the centre back.

Colour: Black (other colours available please ask)

Fabric: silk taffeta, tulle, cotton

Size: this dress can be made to measure or selected from standard sizes

This dress is hand made to order and will us take two weeks to make plus shipping.

description:
Coral pink silk and tulle girls party dress. Hand made in England.

The dress has a silk bodice trimmed in a pretty turquoise blue Liberty floral print and features a full silk organza skirt. 

Dress Name: ELISE

Fastens at back with a concealed zipper and cut generously to allow for as much wear as possible (in our experience little girls don't want to take their special dresses off!)

name: Dotty Tulle Cape - Faye
description:
Pretty dotty ivory Tulle Cape for Bridesmaids, Flowergirls, Partys or Dressing up!

Delicate and floaty, with a pom pom trim tie.

Fastens with bow at front, lovely alternative to cardigan.

Fits Child age 1-6 years 

*OTHER COLOURS/MULTIPLES AVAILABLE - JUST ASK X

Designed and Handmade in England by Anna Vickery.

name: Seafoam Green Silk Dress - Lisia
description:
A very pretty Flower Girl Dress, to fit age 4-5 years.

This dress is handmade with a silk bodice, beautiful ruffle sleeves, lace trim and a full gathered skirt - floaty and twirly! The dress is self lined and comes with a matching belt&bow.

Fastens at back with a concealed zipper and cut generously to allow for as much wear as possible (in our experience little girls don't want to take their special dresses off!)

This is a one off unique garment, far more special than having something 'off the peg' & no worries about anyone else having the same!

Designed and Made in England by Anna Vickery.

* ALSO AVAILABLE MADE TO ORDER IN DIFFERENT SIZES AND COLOURS! Just ask x

Fabrics - Mix of silk and synthetic
Size (to fit) - Chest 22", Length 21.5"

name: Childs Tulle Petticoat
description:
Little girls net tulle petticoat with cotton top.

A very popular garment, perfect worn on its own over thick tights/leggings or for amazing twirly volume under a full skirt (which we can also make!)

Please let us know age of child on ordering and we will ensure correct length, stretchy elastic waistband allows lots of growing room.

Ages available 1 - 8 yrs - also see our adults underskirts.....

Designed and handmade in England by Anna Vickery.

Made to order - print on cotton top section may vary, LOTS OF OTHER COLOURS AVAILABLE, multiple orders welcome ( think bridesmaids flowergirls ) just ask x

PLEASE ALLOW UP TO TWO WEEKS FOR THE PETTICOAT TO BE MADE FOR YOU.

name: Corded Lace Flower Girl Dress - Belle
description:
A Stunning Ivory Lace and Chiffon Girls Dress

This dress is handmade with a corded lace bodice, satin trim and a full gathered chiffon skirt - floaty and twirly! The dress is lined in silk and comes with a belt&bow.

Fastens at back with a concealed zipper and cut generously to allow for as much wear as possible. The 'T Shirt' style bodice has proved to be very popular with older girls/teenagers.

Designed and Made in England by Anna Vickery.

This is a one off unique garment, far more special than having something 'off the peg' & no worries about anyone else having the same!

Fabrics - Mix of silk and synthetic

AVAILABLE MADE TO ORDER Please allow up to two weeks for your dress to made at the studio. 

FOR MORE INFO PLEASE CONTACT anna@alexandra-king.com

name: Pink Childs Tulle Petticoat
description:
Little girls net/tulle petticoat with cotton patterned top.

A very popular garment, perfect worn on its own over thick tights/leggings or for amazing twirly volume under a full skirt. 

Designed and handmade in England by Anna Vickery.

Made to order - print on cotton top section may vary.

name: Strawberry Tulle Party Dress
description:
A cute and gorgeous red strawberry print party dress, perfect for twirling in. 

This dress has a cotton sleeveless bodice with a full red tulle skirt and a matching strawberry print corsage on the waist that is detachable. 
The dress is lined in a smooth satin and cotton and fastens with a zip at the back. 

Washing: hand wash only

Size: Age 6-7
Chest: 29"
Waist: 28"
Length from Shoulder: 27"

This dress is hand made at the studio by Anna Vickery and can also be made to order. 

Shipped via tracked delivery wrapped in tissue in a box.

name: Tulle petticoat
description:
A wardrobe essential for your full circle skirts and the must have slip to make your dress something stylish rather than flat.  

Our soft tulle underskirt is available in ivory and black

Stretch waistband 
satin smooth panel
raw edged soft tulle skirt made from 21 metres of tulle.

Washing: hand wash or machine wash on cool. This my soften the effects of the net. 

Size: 
Small will fit a 24" waist to a 28" waist
Medium will fit a 30" waist to a 34" waist
Length: 21" 

Fit: stretch waist and designed to wear on the hip giving a smooth line to your skirt.
